text: Heliconia brenneri is a species of plant in the family Heliconiaceae.José E. Abalo & Gustavo Morales L. 1983. Phytologia 52(6): 392–393, f. sn., Heliconia brenneri It is endemic to Ecuador.http Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families, Heliconia brenneri Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forest. The expansion of the road passing through its range poses a potential threat.Ulloa Ulloa, C. & Pitman, N. 2004. Heliconia brenneri. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. ==References== Category:Flora of Ecuador brenneri Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
